--- grant_change_stream_privilege.sql
GRANT SELECT ON CHANGE STREAM cs_name_one, cs_name_two TO ROLE hr_manager
--- AST
&ast.Grant{
  Privilege: &ast.SelectPrivilegeOnChangeStream{
    Select: 6,
    Names: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 30,
        NameEnd: 41,
        Name: "cs_name_one",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 43,
        NameEnd: 54,
        Name: "cs_name_two",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 63,
      NameEnd: 73,
      Name: "hr_manager",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRANT SELECT ON CHANGE STREAM cs_name_one, cs_name_two TO ROLE hr_manager
